Class BigTwo

  • java.lang.Object
    • BigTwo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardGame

    public class BigTwo
extends java.lang.Object
implements CardGame
    Class where the logic of game is implemented. Actual game begins in main part in this class. Includes card deck, list of players consisting of 4, hands of cards on table, console used for BigTwo game as variables. Implements methods used for retrieving the deck, list of players, current index of player, making hand and start method where the logic of game is implemented.
    Author:
    choijaewon

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(int playerID,
                     int[] cardIdx)
        Player with certain ID makes a move using a selected card. Calls checkMove method to check whether the move is valid or not.
        Specified by:
        makeMove in interface CardGame
        Parameters:
        playerID - Integer value indicating certain player.
        cardIdx - List of indices of cards selected by the player.

      • checkMove

        public void checkMove(int playerID,
                      int[] cardIdx)
        Checks the move by the player with certain ID is valid or not. Rejects the move if the move by the player is invalid. Prints out corresponding message to GUI according to the move by player. Decides whether to pass the turn to next player. Checks if game must be ended or not.
        Specified by:
        checkMove in interface CardGame
        Parameters:
        playerID - Interger value indicating certain player.
        List - of indices of cards selected by the player.

      • start

        public void start(Deck deck)
        Sets the conditions for the game. Starts the game with a deck. Removes all cards from players and table. Distributes cards to each player. Identifies who has diamond three thus making the player as the first player to play. Updates the value of current player and active player by identifying who is the first player.
        Specified by:
        start in interface CardGame
        Parameters:
        deck - BigTwo card deck used for game.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main where the game starts. Creates the BigTwo game. Creates the BigTwo deck, shuffles it and passes to the game.
        Parameters:
        args - not being used.

      • composeHand

        public static Hand composeHand(CardGamePlayer player,
                               CardList cards)
        Composes valid hand according to the condition of each hand of the BigTwo card game.
        Parameters:
        player - player who selected this hand.
        cards - selected cards by the player.
        Returns:
        Hand returns one of Single, Pair, Triple, Straight, Flush, FullHouse, Quad, and StraightFlush if the hand is valid. returns null if it is not a valid hand.
